name: Train To Babylon
description:
This is a narrative game that can be experienced by walking around Yurba Buena Gardens in San Francisco!   Just outside of GDC.  Download the app on either Android or Apple, and listen to the train and its inhabitants as you walk around the Yurba Buena Gardens circular sidewalk!!

Made on Train Jam 2019

Written by Sisi Jiang

Audio/Development 
by Kurt Roembke

Voices by:
Arlen Pringle
Jazmín Gialito
Arianna Eiler
Talon Grijalva
Adina Shanholtz
Josh Delson
Robbie Bangart
Elie Abraham
Whitney “Strix” Beltrán
